marklogic.body: I've often thought the more recent titles have made puzzles (and everything else, to certain extents) too self-contained. I miss the structure of the GB titles, which were excellent at making puzzles out of the places and enemies themselves so that you had to travel about doing all sorts of stuff to Reach a goal. I don't really enjoy the pattern of manipulating one thing, moving forward, solving a riddle, moving on, playing Tic-tac-toe, moving forward... The puzzle aspect shouldn't be divorced from the adventuring.
